prompt: A data engineer sits confidently at a spacious, modern workstation, surrounded by neatly organized office supplies and papers. The workspace features a large desk with several monitors, all turned off. Natural light streams in from nearby windows, casting soft shadows. The environment is inviting and professional, with potted plants and tasteful decor. The engineer, dressed in smart-casual attire, is focused and engaged, hands on the keyboard or writing notes, with a mug nearby. No visible screens, tech interfaces, text, or posters.
